partnerDetails.about:
Infinite Control Co., Ltd. is Engineering services company provide the fully Automation System solution, Control, Supervisory, Data Structure and On top Application. 
Services:
Feasibility / Front-End Engineering Design
  • Detailed Engineering.
  • Procurement, Fabrication, Installation and Commissioning.
  • Services and Maintenance Contract.
Automation Systems
  • PLC, SIS, HMI and SCADA.
  • Pipeline Transmission System Control.
  • Water Supply and Treatment System.
  • Robotics Control System.
  • Oil and Gas Operation System.
  • TAS (Terminal Automation System)
Historian / Data Management
  • Process Historian Data Collection.
  • Historian Data Management.
  • MSSQL,Oracle Data Management and Reported.
On Top Application
  • MSSQL or Oracle Data Structure.
  • MS.NET Application for Data Visualization.
  • Web Application for Multi-Functional Propose.
  • SIS(Stock Information System).
